description:
No matter how hard she tries to come up with a new idea, Kaos can’t seem to draw a new storyboard and she descends into the Kaospiral. Meanwhile, Koyume also hasn’t finished her storyboard, so she plans to go out for a change of pace. Kaos is amazed that Koyume has all these ideas that she would never think of so she tries to adopt the Koyumethod herself and goes out with her.
Source: crunchyroll
